summary: @taylorswift has inspired me to love myself unconditionally and be the best version of myself. only recently, I finally came out...
body: @taylorswift has inspired me to love myself unconditionally and be the best version of myself. only recently, I finally came out as bisexual to my closest friends in school after a year of being closeted and scared of what they might think. but now, after being showered with love and support, i can proudly be myself unconditionally. taylor was also a big part of this journey with songs like wtny (where I literally shouted “BOYS AND BOYS AND GIRLS AND GIRLS”) that would be on a constant loop. it was also super ressurring to know about Taylor supporting the LGBTQ+ community and in october when taylor fully said she wanted to fight for our rights, I felt appreciated and it just made me realise how awesome taylor is!! so anyway, here is a picture of me posing with a rainbow cup that I mysteriously found in my house the other day (peek the snake ring 🐍) and presenting my gayness. if anybody has or is going through the same thing, just remember, taylor loves you and you WILL get through this!!!! 🏳️‍🌈💖💖💗💖❤️🏳️‍🌈💖💗💖💗❤️💗🏳️‍🌈

summary: Welp I just found out my ex cheated on me not once but twice (to my knowledge now at least. Who knows how many other girls there...
body:
Welp I just found out my ex cheated on me not once but twice (to my knowledge now at least. Who knows how many other girls there were that just didn’t tell me) and ON MY 22ND BIRTHDAY TOO

He was on his phone the whole time at my party and super on edge. Now I know why.

@taylorswift Thank you for always having music for every situation that I need ❤ I love you Tay

blog.name: twiggymolly
blog.title: Jeweler From Oregon Who Loves Taylor Swift

summary:
‪
‪Heard a radio DJ say that fans of a singer named Taylor were insanely faithful. ‬‪Heard wanegbt and fell in love with a song...
body:
Story of becoming a Swiftie

‪

‪Heard a radio DJ say that fans of a singer named Taylor were insanely faithful. ‬‪Heard wanegbt and fell in love with a song for the first time since high school in 1986. ‬Heard Shake It Off and lost my mind.

The above happened in a span of one month

Youtubed her videos and watched her entire video collection in one day.

IN ONE DAY. Imagine getting to hear all her music for the first time in one sitting.

Imagine getting to listen to debut, fearless, Speak Now, Red, 1989, Reputation all at once!!

So I buy every album ,physical copy as I’m old school. And I play all album every day in entirety every day.

It never even occurred to me that social media was a way to express mutual joy over Taylor. I don’t even have a single Swiftie friend. Not online or in person.

I see a picture of her at the 1989 tour and, having NO clue (again, I just listen to her music and didn’t go on social media) that her fans dressed in costume, but I randomly decide to dress like her one Halloween.

A friend in real life who knew I loved Taylor told me that I shouldn’t because she was a snake. What?? So I went on twitter. Found her tribe. Swifties. My future people group. Then I learned. About Taylor and her character. From a million anecdotal stories and facts from places like Wikipedia. Then I adored the woman. Not just the entertainer. But as a person. I admired, related and cheered on. I went looking for a reason that she was actually a snake. Many celebrities that I had onced loved had turned out to be a disappointment so I expected her to be one too. But I only found a truely wonderful human.

So I found others online. But didn’t interact much yet. Until after my seattle concert. I bought pit tickets for myself and my kids (one is a Swiftie, the other isnt, yet said that watching Taylor, he knew he was watching the greatest performance he would ever watch in his life) since I knew zero Swifties I’m real life I gave away hundreds of bags of rainbow jellybeans with “Taylor Swift Loves you” on it. I made real life friends.

I traveled across America with a new Swiftie friend to see another concert. She wore an entirely hand knitted Olivia onesie. Pretty sure that was unique for the entire tour. Made more friends. Danced my ass off!

I still can’t watch the Netflix show without crying. Too many memories.

Planned a birthday/New Years Eve/Rep tour viewing party. Made a trivia board game. Glitter was everywhere!

My family has given me the Best Christmas present, the best way to end the Rep era- they bought me the LWYMMD THRONE! So thankful for my loving family! It arrives this week and I’m so excited! (Okay so Taylor’s throne is custom, so mine looks A LOT like it but with different carvings right where the hands lay)

This is my first time understanding the Swiftie culture especially inbetween eras.

So if you’ve read this far, thank you fellow Swifties! Thank you @taylorswift !

You may now scroll past my post, to the cute pictures of Taylor and her cats that other more rational Swifties post. Cheers!!
